channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Interconnect_Tenant Service Datatype Description Local bgpAsn Specifies ASN used for BGP. Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime errorMessage Type: string globalRoutingFlag The Direct Link connectivity to all SoftLayer data centers if globalRoutingFlag = 1 and local connectivity if globalRoutingFlag = 0. Type: boolean id Type: integer linkSpeed Link speed of a Direct Link connection.
